cbfx.ui.appium

Class AppiumNativeDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • cbfx.ui.appium.AppiumNativeDriver

  • public class AppiumNativeDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    Supporting mobile applications like keyEvents,clear,click, select,verifyText,checkPage etc.

    • Constructor Summary
